text: Kópavogur College () is an upper-secondary school in Kópavogur, Iceland, founded on September 22, 1973. ==External links== *MK's website *Nemendafélag Menntaskólans í Kópavogi, MK's student council website ===References=== Category:Education in Iceland Category:Educational organizations based in Iceland Category:Kópavogur Category:Educational institutions established in 1973 Category:1973 establishments in Iceland
title: Kópavogur College
